original_title: スーパー・ジャイアンツ 人工衛星と人類の破滅
overview: The 5th Super Giant film.  Super Giant pursues a Nazi-like army that operates on a huge satellite in space. The satellite is armed with weapons that could destroy whole cities on Earth from afar. (Part 1 of 2)
title: Super Giant: The Artificial Satellite and the Destruction of Humanity
